verses.verse: וַֽיִּשְׁבְּת֡וּ <WH7673> ceased שְׁלֹ֤שֶׁת <WH7969> So these three הָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <WH582> men הָ֭אֵלֶּה <WH428> these מֵעֲנ֣וֹת <WH6030> to answer אֶת־ <WH853> אִיּ֑וֹב <WH347> Job כִּ֤י <WH3588> because ה֖וּא <WH1931> he צַדִּ֣יק <WH6662> because he [was] righteous בְּעֵינָֽיו׃ <WH5869> in his own eyes פ

וַיִּ֤חַר <WH2734> Then was kindled אַ֨ף ׀ <WH639> the wrath אֱלִיה֣וּא <WH453> of Elihu בֶן־ <WH1121> the son בַּרַכְאֵ֣ל <WH1292> of Barachel הַבּוּזִי֮ <WH940> the Buzite מִמִּשְׁפַּ֪חַ֫ת <WH4940> of the kindred רָ֥ם <WH7410> of Ram בְּ֭אִיּוֹב <WH347> against Job חָרָ֣ה <WH2734> kindled אַפּ֑וֹ <WH639> was his wrath עַֽל־ <WH5921> because צַדְּק֥וֹ <WH6663> because he justified נַ֝פְשׁ֗וֹ <WH5315> himself מֵאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> rather than God

וּבִשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> Also against his three רֵעָיו֮ <WH7453> friends חָרָ֪ה <WH2734> kindled אַ֫פּ֥וֹ <WH639> was his wrath עַ֤ל <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after לֹא־ <WH3808> no מָצְא֣וּ <WH4672> because they had found מַעֲנֶ֑ה <WH4617> no answer וַ֝יַּרְשִׁ֗יעוּ <WH7561> and [yet] had condemned אֶת־ <WH853> אִיּֽוֹב׃ <WH347> Job

וֶֽאֱלִיה֗וּ <WH453> Now Elihu חִכָּ֣ה <WH2442> had waited אֶת־ <WH853> אִ֭יּוֹב <WH347> till Job בִּדְבָרִ֑ים <WH1697> had spoken כִּ֤י <WH3588> because זְֽקֵנִים־ <WH2205> older הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> like מִמֶּ֣נּוּ <WH4480> than לְיָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> were years

וַיַּ֤רְא <WH7200> saw אֱלִיה֗וּא <WH453> When Elihu כִּ֘י <WH3588> that אֵ֤ין <WH369> there מַעֲנֶ֗ה <WH4617> that [there was] no answer בְּ֭פִי <WH6310> in the mouth שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <WH7969> of [these] three הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH376> men וַיִּ֥חַר <WH2734> was kindled אַפּֽוֹ׃ <WH639> then his wrath פ

וַיַּ֤עַן ׀ <WH6030> answered אֱלִיה֖וּא <WH453> And Elihu בֶן־ <WH1121> the son בַּֽרַכְאֵ֥ל <WH1292> of Barachel הַבּוּזִ֗י <WH940> the Buzite וַיֹּ֫אמַ֥ר <WH559> and said צָ֘עִ֤יר <WH6810> I am young אֲנִ֣י <WH589> in לְ֭יָמִים <WH3117> years וְאַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> and you יְשִׁישִׁ֑ים <WH3453> and ye [are] very old עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> after that זָחַ֥לְתִּי <WH2119> wherefore I was afraid וָֽאִירָ֓א ׀ <WH3372> and durst מֵחַוֹּ֖ת <WH2331> not shew דֵּעִ֣י <WH1843> you mine opinion אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>
אָ֭מַרְתִּי <WH559> I said יָמִ֣ים <WH3117> Days יְדַבֵּ֑רוּ <WH1696> should speak וְרֹ֥ב <WH7230> and multitude שָׁ֝נִ֗ים <WH8141> of years יֹדִ֥יעוּ <WH3045> should teach חָכְמָֽה׃ <WH2451> wisdom

אָ֭כֵן <WH403> But רֽוּחַ־ <WH7307> [there is] a spirit הִ֣יא <WH1931> he בֶאֱנ֑וֹשׁ <WH582> in man וְנִשְׁמַ֖ת <WH5397> and the inspiration שַׁדַּ֣י <WH7706> of the Almighty תְּבִינֵֽם׃ <WH995> giveth them understanding
לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor רַבִּ֥ים <WH7227> Great men יֶחְכָּ֑מוּ <WH2449> are not [always] wise וּ֝זְקֵנִ֗ים <WH2205> neither do the aged יָבִ֥ינוּ <WH995> understand מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> judgment
לָכֵ֣ן <WH3651> So אָ֭מַרְתִּי <WH559> Therefore I said שִׁמְעָה־ <WH8085> Hearken לִּ֑י אֲחַוֶּ֖ה <WH2331> to me I also will shew דֵּעִ֣י <WH1843> mine opinion אַף־ <WH637> too אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> I

הֵ֤ן <WH2005> Behold הוֹחַ֨לְתִּי <WH3176> Behold I waited לְֽדִבְרֵיכֶ֗ם <WH1697> for your words אָ֭זִין <WH238> I gave ear עַד־ <WH5704> While תְּב֥וּנֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH8394> to your reasons עַֽד־ <WH5704> While תַּחְקְר֥וּן <WH2713> whilst ye searched out מִלִּֽין׃ <WH4405> what to say

וְעָֽדֵיכֶ֗ם <WH5704> even אֶתְבּ֫וֹנָ֥ן <WH995> Yea I attended וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Indeed אֵ֣ין <WH369> there לְאִיּ֣וֹב <WH347> Job מוֹכִ֑יחַ <WH3198> unto you and behold [there was] none of you that convinced עוֹנֶ֖ה <WH6030> [or] that answered אֲמָרָ֣יו <WH561> his words מִכֶּֽם׃ <WH4480> at

פֶּן־ <WH6435> not תֹּ֣֭אמְרוּ <WH559> Lest ye should say מָצָ֣אנוּ <WH4672> We have found out חָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> wisdom אֵ֖ל <WH410> God יִדְּפֶ֣נּוּ <WH5086> thrusteth him down לֹא־ <WH3808> not אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> not man

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> Nor עָרַ֣ךְ <WH6186> Now he hath not directed אֵלַ֣י <WH413> against מִלִּ֑ין <WH4405> [his] words וּ֝בְאִמְרֵיכֶ֗ם <WH561> him with your speeches לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor אֲשִׁיבֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH7725> against me neither will I answer
חַ֭תּוּ <WH2865> They were amazed לֹא־ <WH3808> no עָ֣נוּ <WH6030> they answered ע֑וֹד <WH5750> longer הֶעְתִּ֖יקוּ <WH6275> no more they left off מֵהֶ֣ם <WH1992> like מִלִּֽים׃ <WH4405> speaking

וְ֭הוֹחַלְתִּי <WH3176> When I had waited כִּי־ <WH3588> because לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יְדַבֵּ֑רוּ <WH1696> (for they spake כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because עָ֝מְד֗וּ <WH5975> not but stood still לֹא־ <WH3808> no עָ֥נוּ <WH6030> [and] answered עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> longer

אַעֲנֶ֣ה <WH6030> [I said] I will answer אַף־ <WH637> too אֲנִ֣י <WH589> my חֶלְקִ֑י <WH2506> also my part אֲחַוֶּ֖ה <WH2331> I also will shew דֵעִ֣י <WH1843> mine opinion אַף־ <WH637> also אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> I
כִּ֭י <WH3588> For מָלֵ֣תִי <WH4390> For I am full מִלִּ֑ים <WH4405> of matter הֱ֝צִיקַ֗תְנִי <WH6693> me constraineth ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> the spirit בִּטְנִֽי׃ <WH990> within

הִנֵּֽה־ <WH2009> Behold בִטְנִ֗י <WH990> Behold my belly כְּיַ֥יִן <WH3196> [is] as wine לֹא־ <WH3808> no יִפָּתֵ֑חַ <WH6605> [which] hath no vent כְּאֹב֥וֹת <WH178> bottles חֲ֝דָשִׁ֗ים <WH2319> like new יִבָּקֵֽעַ׃ <WH1234> it is ready to burst
אֲדַבְּרָ֥ה <WH1696> I will speak וְיִֽרְוַֽח־ <WH7304> that I may be refreshed לִ֑י אֶפְתַּ֖ח <WH6605> I will open שְׂפָתַ֣י <WH8193> my lips וְאֶֽעֱנֶֽה׃ <WH6030> and answer

אַל־ <WH408> to no נָ֭א <WH4994> now אֶשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> Let me not I pray you accept פְנֵי־ <WH6440> person אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> any man's וְאֶל־ <WH413> to אָ֝דָ֗ם <WH120> unto man לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor אֲכַנֶּֽה׃ <WH3655> neither let me give flattering titles

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יָדַ֣עְתִּי <WH3045> For I know אֲכַנֶּ֑ה <WH3655> not to give flattering titles כִּ֝מְעַ֗ט <WH4592> would soon יִשָּׂאֵ֥נִי <WH5375> take me away עֹשֵֽׂנִי׃ <WH6213> [in so doing] my maker
